alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Lipscomb; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 3:17PM CDT until June 22 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northern Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hemphill County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 316 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Lipscomb to 5 miles east of Lora, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Canadian, Briscoe, Higgins, Allison, Glazier and Lake Marvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
